name: FUR INDUSTRIES OF NORTH AMERICA (FINA) F/K/A FUR WRAPS THE HILL
sampleDescriptions: Any and all issues related to mink farming
Any and all environmental issues related to mink production and fur manufacturing
Any and all issues related to fur labeling; Truth in Fur Labeling Act implementation; international trade issues affecting trade in apparel/textiles
Any and all issues related to the Animal Enterprise Terrorism Act and investigation and prosecution of ecoterrorist activities
Any and all issues pertaining to regulation of trapping on national wildlife refuges.
